Name: Stacky Desktop Edition
About the game: Welcome to Stacky Desktop Edition A puzzle game about stacks There are 2 panels each containing a stack. You can apply operations on the left stack (working). On the right is the target stack, cannot be modified Scope is to recreate the right stack arrangement. There are several puzzle generators of different difficulty. So will not run out of puzzles.
